attributes.action: Prevent meltdown of the UK economy by freezing the system
attributes.additional_details:
To save the next generation from the debt of propping up the entire system for several months while we try to tackle Covid-19.

To stop the majority of the leisure industry going bankrupt.

To support families and ultimately to save lives.
attributes.background: Please stop the traditional economy for an interim period while Covid-19 escalates. Stop all debts, mortgages, staff payments: stop everything. Provide a basic payment to all UK citizens to cover food, medicine and basic needs.

rejection.details:
We understand that you want the Government to take action to mitigate the impact of coronavirus on the economy, but we can only accept petitions that make a clear request from the Government for a specific action.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Encourage lenders to suspend interest, fees and repayments during COVID-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/305297

Implement Universal Basic Income to give home & food security through Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302284

Government to offer economic assistance to the Leisure industry during COVID-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304108

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 
www.gov.uk/coronavirus
https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
